Creation Object.definition: An Object Made Using Shapes And Tubes From The Makerpen

Rec Room Object.definition: Something That Can Be Created/Spawned By The Maker Pen Tools

Item.definition: A Player-Made Object That Uses One Or More Objects To Serve A Purpose

Prop.definition: An Object Found Under The Props Tab In The Maker Pen Menu That Has Been Pre-Made By Rec Room

Tool.definition: An Object Used To Manipulate Other Objects

Entity.definition: Anything That Exists In A Room

Client.definition: The Machine In Which A Player Is Running Rec Room On

Localized.definition: A Signal That Only Exists In The Executing Clients Instance

Synced.definition: A Signal That Exists For All Clients In An Instance

Global.definition: The Status Of The World That Is The Same For All Players

To Sync.definition: To Transfer A Signal From A Clients Machine Into The Global Network

To Localize.definition: To Transfer A Signal From The Global Network Into Select Clients

Instance (Rec Room Wise).definition: An Instance (Real World Wise) of a Room Containing Players

Player.definition: The Ingame Character Of A Client

Signal.definition: An Activation That Can Travel To And From Other Chips

Circuit.definition: A Group Of Chips That Execute A Specific Command

Target.definition: The Object or value affected by an operation
